question: Analyze the social media engagement of all companies in the technology industry for the year 2023.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry and retrieve their details (name, ID, and active status).
Gather social media engagement metrics for each identified company from social media activity tables (such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube) for the year 2023.
Consolidate and summarize the engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) per company for each social media platform to provide a comparative analysis.
Generate a report highlighting any significant trends or observations regarding social media engagement among technology companies in 2023.
